name: Kevin Feige
description: President of Marvel Studios and primary producer of the Marvel Cinematic Universe films.

name: Kathleen Kennedy
description: President of Lucasfilm and producer of Star Wars, Indiana Jones, and many other iconic films.

name: Jerry Bruckheimer
description: Prolific producer known for action films and television series.

name: Gale Anne Hurd
description: Producer of science fiction and horror films and television.

name: Hayao Miyazaki
description: Co-founder of Studio Ghibli and producer of acclaimed animated films.

name: Jason Blum
description: Founder of Blumhouse Productions, known for successful low-budget horror films.

name: Dede Gardner
description: President of Plan B Entertainment and producer of acclaimed films.

name: Frank Marshall
description: Producer who has worked on many blockbuster franchises.

name: Michael G. Wilson
description: Producer of the James Bond film series.
